name: Digene Gel
description: Digene Mint Oral gel is pleasantly flavoured viscous suspension and provides quick & effective relief from acidity & gas. Digene gel contains Aluminium Hydroxide, Magnesium Hydroxide, Simethicone, and Sodium Carboxymethylcellulose. The Aluminium hydroxide is an antacid, which neutralises increased stomach acid. Simethicone is an anti-flatulent which helps in reducing bloating, discomfort or pain caused by excessive gas. Magnesium hydroxide is a laxative that increases water in the intestine and reduces stomach acid. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
